item.title: An Analysis of General Medical and Specialist Journals that Endorse CONSORT Found that Reporting Was Not Enforced Consistently
item.description: Reference Edward Mills, Ping Wu, Joel Gagnier, Diane Heels-Ansdell, Victor M. Montori “An analysis of general medical and specialist journals that endorse CONSORT found that reporting was not enforced consistently” (2005) // Journal of Clinical Epidemiology. Publisher: Elsevier BV. Vol. 58. No 7. Pp. 662–667.
